summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3353, for the improvement of the alley in block 24, Capitol Hill Addition Division No. 2, being the alley between 18th Avenue North and 19th Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41373 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
